Title: Authorizes Medicaid coverage for the complex care assistant program
Summary: Establishes a program for specific individuals to become complex care assistants and provide private duty complex care services to children or young adults with developmental disabilities who are Medicaid enrollees.
LawCode: Add ยง365-q, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authorizing Medicaid coverage for complex care assistant services
